titleStmt.title: The poore mans cry Wherein is shevved the present miserable estate of mee Iohn Lilburne, close prisoner in the fleete. Also an humble petition to his Maiesties honorable privy councill, for meantenance that I famish not.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Richt Right Press] Published by a backe friend of the English popish prelates,
